name: mdb-recovery
short_description:
Microsoft access database is one of the perfect application to store and maintain the database. Lost Access Database due to some errors like 
Error 3049: will not allow you to open the access database etc and corruption errors like system crash/failure.
Access Recovery Software is one of to perfect utility and advance application to repair access database in  very less time and will ensure that will not affect the originality of access database during recovery. It will recover the whole table's data and table's structure with all key's and relationships.
summary: Instantly Repair Access Database with Access Recovery Software!!!
